hoxhud_alrtcivs_infobox_enable_help: Displays an infobox showing the number of alerted civilians during stealth.
hoxhud_anticheat_only_help: Disables the HUD elements and leaves only the anticheat code active.
hoxhud_armor_regen_color_help: Color to use for the armor regen timer text.
hoxhud_armor_regen_size_help: Font size to use for the armor regen timer text.
hoxhud_batter_up_help: All that needs to be said is: do a non-stealth mission (or take out all enemies) and fatally bash someone in the head with the baseball bat.
hoxhud_bdy_infobox_enable_help: Displays an infobox showing how many bodybags you have.
hoxhud_civ_pacified_arrow_col_help: Sets the color to change the arrow that displays when a pacified civilian with a ! is not on-screen.
hoxhud_civ_pacified_icon_col_help: Sets the color to change the ! icon when a civilian has been shouted down (pacified).
hoxhud_compat_text: HoxHud has been disabled due to incompatibility with the new version of Payday 2. You will be informed about an update hotfix when it is available.
hoxhud_disable_orig_suspicion_help: Disables the built-in suspicion meter. Mainly for if you prefer having only the numeric counter.
hoxhud_dmg_counter_ignore_civs_help: Toggle civilian damage counters on or off
hoxhud_dmg_hit_color_help: Change the color of the damage indicator when you hit someone
hoxhud_dmg_kill_color_help: Change the color of the damage indicator when you kill someone
hoxhud_dmg_kill_flash_spd_help: Change the speed of how fast the damage indicator flashes
hoxhud_dmg_vert_offset_help: Change the vertical offset for the damage indicator
hoxhud_dom_infobox_enable_help: Displays an infobox showing the number of dominated enemies.
hoxhud_ecmfb_infobox_enable_help: Displays an infobox showing how many ECMs are currently running feedback.
hoxhud_enemy_health_horz_help: Set the horizontal position of the enemy health. An empty slider will have it at the left.
hoxhud_enemy_health_size_help: Set the size of the enemy health indicator
hoxhud_enemy_health_vert_help: Set the vertical position of the enemy health. An empty slider will have it at the top.
hoxhud_enemy_hurt_color_help: Set the color for the health indicator to flash when you deal some damage to the enemy.
hoxhud_enemy_infobox_enable_help: Displays an infobox showing how many enemies are currently alive on the map.
hoxhud_enemy_kill_color_help: Set the color for the health indicator to flash when you kill an enemy.
hoxhud_fatal_hit_chg_per_tick_help: Change the speed that the damage indicator moves upward for fatal hits.
hoxhud_gage_infobox_enable_help: Displays an infobox showing how many gage packages are left on the map.
hoxhud_headshot_flash_color_help: Change the color of the damage indicator when you headshot someone
hoxhud_headshot_gore_help: Configure which weapons have gory decapitating headshots.
hoxhud_hit_chg_per_tick_help: Change the speed that the damage indicator moves upward for non-fatal hits.
hoxhud_hit_display_duration_help: Change the time that the damage indicator stays on screen
hoxhud_hit_ind_box_diameter_help: Sets the rotation radius that hit indicators will rotate around.
hoxhud_hit_ind_fade_col_help: Sets the color for the indicator to change as it fades away.
hoxhud_hit_ind_fade_duration_help: Sets the duration that a hit indicator will be visible for when you get shot.
hoxhud_hit_ind_max_num_help: Sets the maximum number of hit indicators that will be displayed before older ones are removed.
hoxhud_hit_ind_start_col_help: Sets the starting color for a Hit indicator to use.
hoxhud_hud_only_help: Disables all anticheat functionality. Only recommended if you have issues after an update
hoxhud_inf_ammo_flash_col_help: Color for your ammo counter to flash while the Bulletstorm skill is active.
hoxhud_interact_timer_color_help: Sets the color for the interaction color to gradually turn as it nears completion.
hoxhud_jkr_infobox_enable_help: Displays an infobox showing the number of converted enemies.
hoxhud_kill_counter_color_help: Color to use for the kill counter text.
hoxhud_lootbag_infobox_enable_help: Displays an infobox showing how many bagged/unbagged loot items are on the map.
hoxhud_money_cheated_dialog_text: Looks like you were in a mission with a cheater, would you like to reset your spending to $SPENDING; and your offshore to $OFFSHORE;
hoxhud_numeric_susp_max_col_help: Sets the ending color for the numeric suspicion percentage text.
hoxhud_numeric_susp_min_col_help: Sets the starting color for the numeric suspicion percentage text.
hoxhud_overkill_dmg_boost_col_help: Set the color for the health indicator to flash when the Overkill shotgun damage boost skill is active
hoxhud_pagers_infobox_enable_help: Displays an infobox showing the number of pagers remaining during stealth.
hoxhud_pti_threshold_help: Sets the minimum seconds for push2interact. Only active if the above option is set to "Above/Below Threshold".
hoxhud_recolor_name_text_help: Recolors Player Name text in the HUD to match their callsign dot color.
hoxhud_rotate_for_angled_sight_help: When you activate the sniper angled sight, the stance will rotate and align to it.
hoxhud_autopick_lootdrop_card_text: Autopick a card at the lootdrop screen
hoxhud_autopick_lootdrop_card_help: HoxHud will autopick a card for you. The game already decides what you will receive, it makes no difference if you pick manually.
hoxhud_autocontinue_screens_help: HoxHud will automatically continue from mission end screens, saving you from manually doing it yourself.
hoxhud_show_heist_timer_on_assault_text: Show Heist timer in assault box
hoxhud_show_heist_timer_on_assault_help: Shows the Heist mission timer in the police assault box. Will not take immediate effect if changed while in a mission.
hoxhud_sense_of_humour_bypass_help: Check this if you're a miserable sod who hates funny easter eggs :(
hoxhud_sentry_infobox_enable_help: Displays an infobox showing how many sentries are active on the map.
hoxhud_show_armor_regen_timer_help: Shows a small timer in the bottom left of your health to indicate armor recharge delay
hoxhud_show_civilian_health_help: Shows the health of a civilian when you are targeting one.
hoxhud_infoboxes_per_row_help: Sets the number of infoboxes that will be displayed on each row before starting a new one.
hoxhud_move_assault_indicator_help: Assault Wave Indicator is moved to the Top Center of the screen.
hoxhud_show_dmg_counter_help: Toggle damage counters on or off
hoxhud_show_dmg_per_hit_help: Show a separate damage indicator for each hit or a single incrementing one
hoxhud_show_enemy_health_help: Show enemy health indicator on the main HUD when you are actively targeting a unit
hoxhud_show_enemy_health_mul_help: Shows the enemy health x10. This makes the health values consistent with weapon damage stats.
hoxhud_show_interact_circle_help: Show the default game interaction circle.
hoxhud_show_interact_timer_help: Show a numeric timer during interactions.
hoxhud_show_kill_counter_help: Show kill counters to the left of player names. Your own is headkills/bodykills (total).
hoxhud_show_melee_charge_timer_help: Shows the interaction circle/timer when you are doing a charged melee attack.
hoxhud_show_numeric_suspicion_help: Adds a numeric suspicion % counter when being detected
hoxhud_show_pager_timers_help: Shows a timer for unanswered pagers.
hoxhud_show_pagers_as_client_help: When you're not host, pager timers won't hide if others answer them so you may wish to disable it.
hoxhud_show_timer_on_reload_help: Shows the interaction circle/timer during a reload action.
hoxhud_show_timer_panel_help: Shows timers for drills and various other elements in both the tab screen and main HUD.
hoxhud_susp_back_alpha_help: Sets the transparency for the black outline that surrounds the suspicion percentage text.
hoxhud_tabscreen_migrate_help: Sets the threshold at which a timer will move from the Tab screen to the main screen once it crosses below this value.
hoxhud_undrdg_health_flash_help: Color for your health to flash while Aced Underdog is active.
hoxhud_undrdog_dmg_boost_col_help: Set the color for the health indicator to flash when the Underdog/Combat medic damage boost skill is active
hoxhud_update_text: Your HoxHud install is outdated and we will not accept bug reports for the version you are using. Please update to the latest HoxHud ASAP. The steam overlay will be opened at the download page. Please close Payday 2 before applying the update.
hoxhud_wpn_laser_beam_help: Sets the intensity of the laser beam shaft
hoxhud_wpn_laser_color_help: Sets the color for the laser attachment on your weapon to use.
hoxhud_wpn_laser_glow_help: Sets the intensity of the glow around the dot. Higher values make it less intense
hoxhud_wpn_laser_light_help: Sets the intensity of the point at the end of the laser beam
hud_int_release_alarm_pager: Press $BTN_CANCEL; to release the pager (triggers alarm)
inspect_player_help: Opens the PD2Stats webpage for a player in this lobby on your Steam Overlay.
menu_asset_buy_all_assets_desc: Buys all the assets that you are permitted to acquire
menu_hoxhud_enemy_dmg_options_help: Options for the enemy damage indicator displayed above their head
menu_hoxhud_enemy_health_options_help: Options for the Enemy health indicator.
menu_hoxhud_extra_options_help: Configure the less-common and more esoteric options of HoxHud.
menu_hoxhud_infobox_options_help: Options for the infobox panel displayed in the top right of the main HUD
menu_hoxhud_laser_options_help: Options for customising the laser attachment for your weapons
menu_hoxhud_main_options_help: Options for elements displayed on the main HUD.
menu_hoxhud_visual_options_help: Options for features that aren't directly HUD related such as your laser and headshots.
respec_cheaper_text: NOTICE: Loading this profile will refund you %s%s. Are you sure you wish to continue?
respec_warn_text: WARNING: Loading this profile will cost %s%s. Are you sure you wish to continue?
skillprofiler_del_text: Are you sure you wish to delete profile %s
skillprofiler_text: Select what you would like to do with your Build Profiles.
hoxhud_first_launch_text: It appears this is the first time you have launched Payday 2 with HoxHud. Would you like to watch a YouTube tutorial on what HoxHud has to offer?
